title: Seg4Diff: Unveiling Open-Vocabulary Segmentation in Text-to-Image Diffusion Transformers
selection_reason: Novel approach combining open-vocabulary segmentation with diffusion transformers, addressing important computer vision challenges with potential applications in image editing and generation systems

title: MetaEmbed: Scaling Multimodal Retrieval at Test-Time with Flexible Late Interaction
selection_reason: Addresses scalability challenges in multimodal retrieval systems with test-time scaling approach, directly applicable to real-world search and retrieval applications

title: OnePiece: Bringing Context Engineering and Reasoning to Industrial Cascade Ranking System
selection_reason: Industrial application with 16 authors suggesting real-world validation, introduces context engineering and reasoning to ranking systems which are widely deployed in practice

title: Spiffy: Multiplying Diffusion LLM Acceleration via Lossless Speculative Decoding
selection_reason: Addresses critical efficiency challenges in LLM inference through lossless speculative decoding for diffusion LLMs, essential for practical deployment of large models
